Summary I am an IT Architect. I joined IBM in 1999.  
I started to work for many customers within the IBM Client Center Montpellier on first of the kind projects using leading edge technology around Java, Web Services Security, WebSphere Application Server, Autonomic Computing and Tivoli Automation.  
I made several publications, obtained a number of IBM products certifications and got 3 patents filed, among which one granted by IBM. 
I am currently working at the New Technology Center, in Montpellier, France. I participated in the creation of an IBM STG Lab Services offering. A solution which extends the provisioning capabilities on System z in a cloud computing perspective. 
I am now leading the Virtualization and IT Optimization for zEnterprise team, working on cloud computing architectures with several customers from different industries. 
I am focusing on OpenStack Architecture and the latest Cloud Computing Solutions with System z. Summary I am an IT Architect. I joined IBM in 1999.
